void carBegin()¶

void carSetMotors(int8_t power0, int8_t power1, int8_t power2, int8_t power3)¶

Set speed for 4 motors.

Parameters

  • power0 – 0 ~ 100

  • power1 – 0 ~ 100

  • power2 – 0 ~ 100

  • power3 – 0 ~ 100

void _carMove(int16_t angle, int8_t power, int8_t rot, bool drift = false)¶

Control the car to move to the set angle

Parameters

  • angle – the direction you want the car to move

  • power – moving speed

  • rot – the car fixed rotation angle during the movement

  • drift –

    Whether it is a drift mode

    true, drift mode, the car body will return to square flase, drift mode, the car body will not return to square
